Projects.Project4

Class ServerRack

  • java.lang.Object
    • Projects.Project4.ServerRack

  • public class ServerRack
extends java.lang.Object
    ServerRack class models a single server rack, which a data center may contain many of.
    See Also:
    DataCenter

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String brand
      the brand of a server rack
      private Cooling cooling
      the cooling system of a server rack
      private double operatingCost
      the operating cost of a server rack
      private OS operatingSystem
      the operating system of a server rack
      private Ownership ownership
      the ownership of a server rack
      private int rackID
      the ID of a server rack

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServerRack()
      The default constructor for ServerRack sets the brand to an empty string, the rackID to 0, the operatingCost to 0, the operatingSystem, cooling, and ownership to the first value in their respective enums.
      ServerRack(java.lang.String aBrand, int aRackID, double anOperatingCost, OS anOperatingSystem, Cooling aCooling, Ownership anOwnership)
      The parameterized constructor for ServerRack sets the brand, rackID, operatingCost, operatingSystem, cooling, and ownership to the given values.

      java.lang.String toString()
      A string representing a server rack, with the operating cost formatted to two decimal places.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ServerRack

        public ServerRack()
        The default constructor for ServerRack sets the brand to an empty string, the rackID to 0, the operatingCost to 0, the operatingSystem, cooling, and ownership to the first value in their respective enums.

      • ServerRack

        public ServerRack(java.lang.String aBrand,
                  int aRackID,
                  double anOperatingCost,
                  OS anOperatingSystem,
                  Cooling aCooling,
                  Ownership anOwnership)
        The parameterized constructor for ServerRack sets the brand, rackID, operatingCost, operatingSystem, cooling, and ownership to the given values.
        Parameters:
        aBrand - the brand of the server rack
        aRackID - the ID of the server rack
        anOperatingCost - the operating cost of the server rack
        anOperatingSystem - the operating system of the server rack
        aCooling - the cooling system of the server rack
        anOwnership - the ownership of the server rack
